items.summary: The most surprising part is that the plastic isn't the biggest problem.

items.summary: When fake content goes viral, the damage has already been done, even if the post is debunked.

items.title: California lawmaker proposes a four-year ban on AI chatbots in kids’ toys
items.title_zh: 加州议员提议禁止儿童玩具中使用人工智能聊天机器人四年
items.summary: “Our children cannot be used as lab rats for Big Tech to experiment on,” Senator Steve Padilla said. He just introduced a bill to ban AI chatbots in toys until safety regulations are developed.

items.title_zh: 迄今为止在CES 2026上宣布的最奇怪的技术
items.summary: From an AI panda pet to an anime girl hologram for your desk, here are the wildest products at CES 2026.

items.summary: Intel has been building chips designed for gaming PCs for years but the company is now moving into handheld devices too.

items.title: LMArena lands $1.7B valuation four months after launching its product
items.title_zh: LMArena在推出产品四个月后估值达到17亿$
items.summary: LMArena, which started as a UC Berkeley research project, has raised about $250 million total and become a unicorn in about seven months.

items.title: Founder of spyware maker pcTattletale pleads guilty to hacking and advertising surveillance software

items.summary: Bryan Fleming, the founder of hacked stalkerware company pcTattletale, pleaded guilty to federal charges linked to the running of his now-defunct Michigan-based spyware company.

items.title: Samsung and Intel’s OLED tech makes HDR easier on laptop battery life
items.title_zh: 三星和英特尔的OLED技术使笔记本电脑的电池续航时间更长
items.summary: Samsung Display and Intel have teamed up on laptop technology called SmartPower HDR that they claim can minimize power usage while you're watching HDR content on an OLED screen. Intel showed off this technology last year, but Samsung Display is sharing details about how it works and the power savings you might expect. However, the […]

items.title: Motorola’s first smartwatch promises 13-day battery life and Polar-powered health tracking
items.title_zh: 摩托罗拉首款智能手表承诺13天的电池续航时间和Polar供电的健康跟踪
items.summary: At CES, Motorola announced its first smartwatch, the Moto Watch. According to Motorola, the Android watch offers up to 13 days of battery life, alongside Polar-powered health tracking, open-source software, and dual-frequency GPS - a combination that helps set it apart from Apple's and Google's flagship wearables. Battery life is easily its most notable feature. […]

items.title: Lenovo’s Auto Twist laptop is going from concept to real product
items.title_zh: 联想的Auto Twist笔记本电脑正在从概念走向真正的产品
items.summary: At CES 2026, Lenovo is announcing a new ThinkBook Plus Gen 7 Auto Twist laptop. Once a concept, the 14-inch thin-and-light sports a motorized pivoting hinge, allowing it to twist and angle its screen toward you. It can be manually controlled, but the real trick is tracking your head and automatically adjusting to your position […]

items.title: The new Lenovo Yoga Pro 9i laptop has a super-bright tandem OLED and magnetic stylus
items.title_zh: 全新联想Yoga Pro 9i笔记本电脑配备超亮串联OLED和磁性触控笔
items.summary: Lenovo's new pair of Yoga laptops for CES 2026 are its most powerful and most lightweight models. The flagship Yoga Pro 9i is a creator-focused laptop with a 16-inch 4K tandem OLED reaching 1,600 peak nits of brightness, Intel Panther Lake processor options, and up to an RTX 5070 for a discrete GPU. It also […]

items.title: Lenovo’s new concept rollable could be the ideal gaming laptop
items.title_zh: 联想的新概念可卷曲笔记本电脑可能是理想的游戏笔记本电脑
items.summary: Lenovo is at it again with wild laptop concepts for CES 2026, and the biggest one is the Legion Pro Rollable gaming laptop. It has a flexible OLED display that expands horizontally - as opposed to Lenovo's ThinkBook Plus Gen 6, which rolls up and down. The Legion Pro Rollable's screen goes from a conventional […]

items.title: This ThinkPad laptop concept has a rollable display that wraps around its lid
items.title_zh: 这款ThinkPad笔记本电脑概念有一个可卷绕的显示屏，可以缠绕在它的盖子上
items.summary: At CES 2026, Lenovo is announcing yet another new concept laptop with a transforming screen: the ThinkPad Rollable XD Concept. It's a ThinkPad, complete with its iconic red TrackPoint nub, but it features a flexible OLED display that wraps around to the outer part of its lid. Slide your finger along the folded spin of […]

items.title: Lenovo’s new All-in-One PC can sync its lighting to your notifications
items.title_zh: 联想全新一体机PC可将其照明与您的通知同步
items.summary: If you prefer to have your notifications on silent but don't want to miss anything, Lenovo's new All-in-One (AIO) PC might have a solution. The Yoga AIO i Aura Edition unveiled today at CES features a major design overhaul with a transparent light bar at the bottom of the display. The customizable ambient lighting can […]

items.title: Lenovo’s joining the bandwagon with concept AI glasses
items.title_zh: 联想携手概念AI眼镜加入潮流
items.summary: Lenovo is the latest tech company to get bit by the smart glasses bug. The company just showed off a pair of concept AI glasses at CES 2026. While these weren't a working prototype, we have some idea of where Lenovo's head is at. The lightweight frames weigh about 45g and have a 2MP camera […]

items.title: Lenovo’s second SteamOS handheld is the Legion Go 2
items.title_zh: 联想的第二款SteamOS手持设备是Legion Go 2
items.summary: One year ago, Lenovo became the first company besides Valve to announce a handheld with SteamOS instead of Windows. The result was the Legion Go S with SteamOS; no Steam Deck killer due to price and battery life, but a big step forward in performance and pick-up-and-play portability. Now, Lenovo's doing it again - it's […]

items.title: Moto’s new tracking tag comes with a healthy battery boost
items.title_zh: Moto的新跟踪标签配备了健康的电池提升功能
items.summary: It's always refreshing when the new version of a product gets significantly better battery life than the last. And that's the case with the Moto Tag 2: Motorola's second-gen tracker tag can go more than 500 days before it needs a new battery. That's almost a year and a half that you can forget about […]

items.title: UK and France to send troops to Ukraine if peace deal agreed
items.title_zh: 如果和平协议达成一致，英国和法国将向乌克兰派遣部队
items.summary: The announcement was made by UK PM Sir Keir Starmer after a meeting of Ukraine's allies in Paris.

items.title: Venezuelan security forces detain journalists from foreign news organisations
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉安全部队拘留外国新闻机构记者
items.summary: Venezuelans describe their fear of speaking out as 14 media workers are detained and police check people's social media.

items.title: US may intercept and seize oil tanker heading for Europe, reports say
items.title_zh: 据报道，美国可能会拦截并扣押驶往欧洲的油轮
items.summary: US officials have a warrant to seize the Russian-flagged ship accused of breaking sanctions.

items.title: Six dead and hundreds of flights cancelled as snow causes chaos across Europe
items.title_zh: 由于大雪造成欧洲各地混乱，六人死亡，数百个航班取消
items.summary: Hundreds of flights have been cancelled in Amsterdam and Paris, with thousands of people stranded.

items.title: Iran anti-government protests spread to majority of provinces, videos show
items.title_zh: 视频显示，伊朗反政府抗议活动蔓延到大多数省份
items.summary: Videos show that unrest has spread to more than 50 towns and cities, including pro-government heartlands.

items.title: European allies back Denmark over Trump's threat to annex Greenland
items.title_zh: 欧洲盟友支持丹麦反对特朗普吞并格陵兰的威胁
items.summary: Donald Trump has refused to rule out using force to annex Greenland - a scenario that would spell the end of Nato, according to Denmark.

items.title: Children killed after drone hits home in Sudan, medics say
items.title_zh: 医务人员说，无人机在苏丹击中家园后死亡的儿童
items.summary: At least 13 people, including eight children, have been killed in the strike in el-Obeid city, medics say.

items.title: Zelensky replaces Ukraine's powerful security service chief
items.title_zh: 泽伦斯基接替乌克兰强大的安全局局长
items.summary: The Ukrainian president has come under heavy criticism for his reshuffling of one the country's most successful security agencies.

items.title: Swiss ski bar not inspected for five years before deadly fire, mayor says
items.title_zh: 市长说，瑞士滑雪酒吧在致命火灾发生前五年没有接受检查
items.summary: The New Year's Eve fire at a bar in Crans-Montana killed 40 people and injured 116.

items.title: Macron hosts Ukraine and allies to try to cement security guarantees
items.title_zh: 马克龙接待乌克兰及其盟友，试图巩固安全保障
items.summary: The talks are held as Russia continues attacking Ukraine's energy sector and under the shadow of US threats to annex Greenland.

items.title: Wagner Moura vira nome de drink em premiação de cinema em Nova York
items.title_zh: 瓦格纳·莫拉（ Wagner Moura ）在纽约的一个电影颁奖典礼上成为饮料
items.summary: Wagner Moura foi homenageado de uma forma diferente na noite de gala da New York Film Critics Circle, premiação dos críticos de cinema de Nova York, que acontece nesta terça-feira (6). Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Aprenda a guardar cebolas da forma correta em casa
items.title_zh: 了解如何在家中正确储存洋葱
items.summary: Cebolas (e seus parentes próximos, como o alho e as echalotas) são indispensáveis na cozinha -até o dia em que deixam de ser. Abaixo, descubra como escolher e conservar esses ingredientes para que durem mais na despensa, com uma exceção importante. Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Argumentos a favor do código de conduta no STF destacam benefícios, eventos e relações privadas
items.title_zh: 支持最高法院行为准则的论点强调利益、事件和私人关系
items.summary: Transparência sobre a atuação dos ministros, prevenção de conflitos de interesse e proteção institucional são os argumentos mais citados por nomes de diferentes áreas que defendem a adoção de um código de conduta para os ministros do STF (Supremo Tribunal Federal). Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: O nome do jogo é Cuba
items.title_zh: 游戏的名字是古巴
items.summary: Donald Trump conseguiu o imaginável (sequestrou Nicolás Maduro) e o inimaginável (a vice chavista, Delcy Rodríguez, assumiu a Presidência da "República Bolivariana", prometendo priorizar "uma relação respeitosa e equilibrada" com os Estados Unidos). Vice virando casaca não é novidade, mas a calma bolivariana surpreendeu. Num de seus primeiros atos, Delcy Rodríguez expulsou dois diplomatas franceses depois que o presidente Emmanuel Macron expressou sua preferência pela oposicionista María Corina Machado, que acabou de ganhar o Prêmio Nobel da Paz. Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Christiane Torloni, Antonio Fagundes, Gianecchini e Malu Galli fazem peças em São Paulo
items.title_zh: Christiane Torloni、Antonio Fagundes、Gianecchini和Malu Galli在圣保罗演出
items.summary: Atores conhecidos da dramaturgia brasileira sobem aos palcos da capital paulista nesta semana. Christiane Torloni e Antonio Fagundes voltam a contracenar em "Dois de Nós", enquanto Reynaldo Gianecchini e Maria Casadevall fazem nova temporada de "Um Dia Muito Especial. Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Verba extra do Ministério da Saúde alcança R$ 7,84 bi e dribla STF sobre controle de emendas
items.title_zh: 卫生部的额外资金达到78.4亿雷亚尔，并运用STF进行修正控制
items.summary: O governo Lula (PT) autorizou repasses de cerca de R$ 7,84 bilhões em verbas extras do Ministério da Saúde a estados e municípios com uma fatia do Orçamento que é reivindicada por parlamentares como uma emenda informal. Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Ataque de Trump à Venezuela foi um 'Piratas do Caribe' com menos graça
items.title_zh: 特朗普对委内瑞拉的攻击是一个不那么有趣的“加勒比海盗”
items.summary: Em tempos houve uma distinção entre piratas e corsários. Os piratas atacavam barcos e cidades costeiras, roubavam, pilhavam e faziam mil malfeitorias, ilegalmente, e portanto eram feios, porcos e maus. Os corsários faziam tudo isso, mas com uma carta outorgada por um soberano, e portanto eram belos, bravos e legais. Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Fronteira entre Brasil e Venezuela vive clima de espera cautelosa
items.title_zh: 巴西-委内瑞拉边境经历了谨慎等待的气氛
items.summary: "É tempo de lealdade; duvidar é traição", diz um letreiro no lado venezuelano do posto de fronteira com Pacaraima (RR). À frente, logo ao lado da passagem de carros pouco fiscalizada, um cartaz de cerca de 2 metros de altura traz a fotografia de Edmundo González e a frase "estamos te procurando". Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Antes de ser número, o zero foi um símbolo de ausência
items.title_zh: 在成为数字之前，零是缺席的象征
items.summary: Um amigo jornalista me enviou artigo de um jovem pesquisador em neurociência, Benjy Barnett, sobre um tema fascinante: no nível neurológico, como é que o nosso cérebro representa o número zero? Por trás está a questão mais ampla de como a mente humana compreende o nada, a ausência de algo. O que acontece no nosso cérebro quando olhamos uma árvore e percebemos que não há pássaros nos galhos? A resposta é um ingrediente importante para entendermos o que constitui a consciência humana. Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Antiquada, Bienal de São Paulo sufoca a arte com curadoria extravagante
items.title_zh: 过时的圣保罗双年展以奢华的策展精神扼杀艺术
items.summary: O bosque encerrado entre as vidraças do pavilhão espelha a mata lá fora, um jardim que multiplica o jardim, abalando os alicerces de uma arquitetura que se queria neutra ou pura. Precious Okoyomon, artista do Reino Unido, encheu de plantas a entrada no térreo desta Bienal de São Paulo, num resumo da mostra adiante, cheia de terra, folhas e raízes expostas que dão ao conjunto da exposição um ar tão telúrico quanto sujo. Leia mais (01/06/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Codelco Ends 2025 With A Modest Output Gain Amid Mine Disruptions
items.title_zh: Codelco在矿山中断期间以适度的产出增益结束2025年
items.summary: Key Points Chile’s state copper giant Codelco is reported to have produced about 1.332 million metric tons in 2025, slightly above 2024, after a year marked by a fatal incident at its flagship El Teniente mine. Copper has surged past $13,000 a ton in London as inventories stay thin and fresh labor risks emerge, including […]

items.title: Fed Governor Stephen Miran Breaks Ranks, Urges Aggressive Rate Cuts In 2026
items.title_zh: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰（ Stephen Miran ）突破排名，敦促在2026年大幅降息
items.summary: Key Points A Fed governor says more than 1 percentage point of rate cuts is justified this year. The debate is not only about inflation, but about how much “restraint” the Fed is still imposing. Because the dollar anchors global finance, faster U.S. cuts would ripple into Brazil and the rest of Latin America. A […]

items.title: From Interior To Port: Randon’s $143 Million Order Tracks Brazil’s New Logistics Map
items.title_zh: 从内陆到港口： Randon的1.43亿美元订单追踪巴西的新物流地图
items.summary: Key Points Randoncorp’s RAPT4 rose as much as 8% after a railcar deal worth about R$770 million (about $143 million) took effect. Deliveries run from May 2026 to November 2027, matching the ramp-up timetable for Arauco’s Sucuriú pulp project expected by late 2027. The deeper story is logistics: new rail links are turning Brazil’s interior […]

items.title: Brazil’s Mubadala-Backed Base Exchange Targets a 2026–27 Launch to Challenge B3’s Monopoly
items.title_zh: 巴西穆巴达拉支持的基地交易所计划于2026–27年推出，挑战B3的垄断地位
items.summary: Key Points Mubadala-backed Base Exchange targets a late-2026 or early-2027 launch with its own clearinghouse. It argues “fairer” all-in costs hinge on margin calls and collateral release, not only posted fees. The move comes as Brazil debates D+1 settlement ahead of the 2026 election. Since the 2017 consolidation that produced today’s B3, Brazil’s equities market […]

items.title: Africa Intelligence Brief — January 6, 2026
items.title_zh: 非洲情报简报— 2026年1月6日
items.summary: Today’s clearest signals sit in growth momentum versus funding constraints. East Africa is sending mixed messages: output is improving, but political control is tightening. Southern Africa’s slowdown looks real, and it will shape 2026 capex decisions. In parallel, critical-minerals policy is shifting from talk to price-setting tools. 1. Kenya — GDP growth accelerates to 4.9% […]

items.title: Colombia Warns It Will Defend Its Sovereignty if the U.S. Invades
items.title_zh: 哥伦比亚警告说，如果美国入侵，它将捍卫其主权
items.summary: Key Points Bogotá is signaling deterrence after Trump floated “Venezuela-style” action. The Venezuela operation’s aftermath is now shaping regional risk calculations. Markets and border planners are reacting before any policy is formalized. Colombia’s foreign minister, Rosa Villavicencio, said the armed forces must be prepared to defend Colombia’s territory and sovereignty if the United States were […]

items.title: PicPay’s U.S. IPO Filing Tests Whether Brazil’s Fintech Moment Is Back
items.title_zh: PicPay的美国IPO申请测试巴西的金融科技时刻是否回归
items.summary: Key Points PicPay has filed for a Nasdaq listing, aiming to trade under the ticker PICS, in what could become Brazil’s most important fintech IPO since 2021. The company reported sharp growth in profit and revenue through September 2025, reinforcing its pitch that scale and engagement can translate into earnings. The deal highlights a familiar […]

items.title: Uruguay Ends 2025 With Its Lowest Inflation Since 2001
items.title_zh: 乌拉圭2025年通货膨胀率降至2001年以来的最低水平
items.summary: Key Points Uruguay’s 2025 inflation was 3.65%, below the 4.5% target and the lowest year-end since 2001. December prices fell 0.09%, extending 31 straight months within the 3%–6% tolerance band. The central bank cut the policy rate to 7.5% and said more easing is possible in 2026. Uruguay closed 2025 with 3.65% inflation, below the […]

items.title: The precedents to Trump's Venezuela operation
items.title_zh: 特朗普委内瑞拉行动的先例
items.summary: While shocking, nothing about this calamity is new: it recalls four precedents that can help us see elements of the present that otherwise may be shrouded by propaganda or emotion.

items.title: Batam adds traffic education to curriculum, aims to reduce accidents involving s...
items.title_zh: 巴淡岛将交通教育添加到课程中，旨在减少涉及...
items.summary: Batam, the largest city in Riau Islands province, is an economic center with high vehicle mobility thanks to its free trade zone status.

items.title: The paradox of police reform: High approval ratings, low rule of law
items.title_zh: 警察改革的悖论：高支持率，低法治
items.summary: Despite the sweeping reform in 1998, the National Police is still fraught with a culture of violence, uneven professionalism and a lack of accountability.

items.title: Tourism safety in spotlight after Saudi tourist killed in jet ski accident
items.title_zh: 沙特游客在喷气式滑雪事故中丧生后，旅游安全成为人们关注的焦点
items.summary: A lawmaker has called for a sweeping overhaul of Indonesia’s tourism safety and security standards, saying a series of fatal incidents involving both domestic and foreign tourists has exposed serious weaknesses in oversight and enforcement.

items.title: Overcrowded settlements, weak safety fuel Jakarta’s fire crisis
items.title_zh: 居住区过度拥挤，安全薄弱加剧了雅加达的火灾危机
items.summary: Jakarta’s fire crisis deepened in 2025 as higher death tolls and mounting losses revealed enduring risks in overcrowded neighborhoods and poorly regulated commercial buildings.

items.title: From print to platforms: What holds nations together now?
items.title_zh: 从印刷到平台：现在是什么将各国团结在一起？
items.summary: The increasingly virtual world has made digital platforms the central stage of democracy.

items.title: Democrats back Prabowo’s plan to end direct regional elections
items.title_zh: 民主党人支持普拉博沃结束地区直接选举的计划
items.summary: The pro-government Democratic Party has thrown its weight behind President Prabowo Subianto’s suggestion to abolish direct elections for regional heads, potentially overturning a legacy of democracy that came about under its founding figure, former president Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono.

items.title: Trade protectionism to persist in 2026
items.title_zh: 贸易保护主义将在2026年持续
items.summary: Trade protectionism has become a new normal that economists say Indonesia will have to navigate carefully this year through market diversification.

items.title: New KUHP, KUHAP meets legal pushback in Constitutional Court
items.title_zh: 新的KUHP ， KUHAP在宪法法院遭遇法律驳回
items.summary: At least 10 judicial review petitions against the new Criminal Code (KUHP) and Criminal Law Procedures Code (KUHAP) have been filed with the Constitutional Court within four days after the new laws came into force.

items.title: Beyond wage hikes
items.title_zh: 超越加薪
items.summary: Instead of simply calculating minimum wages that will support a decent standard of living per worker per region, the government must do more in implementing an integrated policy approach that focuses on cost of living relief for households.

items.title: 'Controlled by me’: Trump says Venezuela to send US up to 50 million barrels of oil; lays out plan
items.title_zh: “由我控制” ：特朗普称委内瑞拉将向美国运送多达5000万桶石油；制定计划
items.summary: President Trump announced Venezuela's interim authorities will transfer 30-50 million barrels of sanctioned oil to the US. The crude will be sold at market prices, with proceeds controlled by the US government to benefit both nations. This move aims to leverage Venezuela's oil reserves, which have accumulated due to US sanctions.

items.title: Europe sees red over Greenland as Trump aide asserts it belongs to US
items.title_zh: 欧洲认为格陵兰岛是红色的，因为特朗普的助手声称它属于美国

items.title: Delhi: MC carries out demolition drive near Turkman Gate; 5 cops injured in stone pelting
items.title_zh: 德里： MC在Turkman Gate附近进行拆迁； 5名警察在石块投掷中受伤
items.summary: Acting on Delhi High Court orders, the Municipal Corporation of Delhi conducted an early-morning demolition drive near Faiz-e-Elahi Masjid. Despite heavy police security and coordination efforts, a brief stone-pelting incident occurred, which was controlled with minimal force. The operation to clear encroached land proceeded with around 17 bulldozers.

items.title: Army outreach in border areas: Solar plant set up in Sikkim; water facility built in Arunachal
items.title_zh: 边境地区的军事外展：在锡金建立太阳能发电厂；在阿鲁纳恰尔建造供水设施

items.title: UP SIR: Nearly 3 crore names deleted from draft rolls; claims open till Feb 6, final list on Mar 6
items.title_zh: UP SIR ：从选秀名册中删除了近3亿卢比的名字；索赔截止到2月6日，最终名单在3月6日
items.summary: Uttar Pradesh's draft voter rolls reveal nearly 3 crore deletions, with 18.7% of electors removed. Over 1.3 crore voters were identified as having permanently shifted, while others were untraceable or deceased. Citizens have until February 6 to file claims and objections to reinstate their names before final rolls are published on March 6.

items.title: Office mandate fallout: AT&T exits longtime home after WFO push; read CEO John Stankey’s memo
items.title_zh: 办公室授权后果： AT ＆ T在WFO推出后长期离职；阅读首席执行官John Stankey的备忘录
items.summary: Telecom giant AT&T is moving its global headquarters to Plano, Texas. The company will build a new corporate campus on a 54-acre site. This move consolidates three existing Dallas-area locations. The new headquarters will be designed for collaboration and innovation. Employee feedback drove the decision for modern workspaces. Partial occupancy is targeted for the second half of 2028.

items.title: 'Dhurandhar' box office: Ranveer, Akshaye starrer surpasses Rs 1,220 crore worldwide
items.title_zh: “Dhurandhar”票房： Ranveer ， Akshaye starrer在全球超过1220亿卢比
items.summary: 'Dhurandhar' shows resilience at the box office, recovering from a recent dip. The film earned approximately Rs 4.75 crore on its thirty-third day, maintaining a steady graph after a significant drop. Despite slipping into single digits in its fifth week, the movie has amassed a substantial Rs 781.75 crore net in India, with worldwide collections exceeding Rs 1,220 crore.

items.title: AAP sarpanch murder suspect killed in Tarn Taran encounter; pistol seized
items.title_zh: AAP sarpanch谋杀嫌疑人在Tarn Taran遭遇战中丧生；手枪被查获
items.summary: An accused in the murder of AAP sarpanch Jarmal Singh, Harnur alias Noor, was killed in a police encounter in Tarn Taran. Noor, a key associate of foreign-based gangster Prabh Dasuwal, was involved in reconnaissance and planning for the killing. The encounter occurred when police attempted to apprehend him following intelligence reports.

items.title: 'Does not belong here': When Manjrekar questioned Kohli's place; how he replied
items.title_zh: “不属于这里” ：当Manjrekar质疑Kohli的地方时；他如何回答
items.summary: In Januray 2012, after India’s heavy loss in the second Test in Sydney, Manjrekar suggested giving Virat one more Test just to be sure "he does not belong here". The remark came at a time when Kohli had managed modest scores in his first two Tests of the series and faced growing scrutiny over his spot in the XI.

items.title: Math genius Joel David Hamkins says AI models are basically useless for math tasks
items.title_zh: 数学天才乔尔·大卫·哈姆金斯（ Joel David Hamkins ）表示，人工智能模型基本上对数学任务毫无
items.summary: Renowned mathematician Joel David Hamkins has voiced strong doubts about large language models' utility in mathematical research, calling their outputs "garbage" and "not mathematically correct." He highlights AI's frustrating tendency to confidently assert incorrectness and resist correction, mirroring unproductive human interactions. Despite AI's benchmark successes, Hamkins finds current systems unreliable for genuine research collaboration.

items.title: Venezuela's New President Hires Ex-Central Bank Boss To Lead Economy
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉新总统聘请前中央银行行长领导经济
items.summary: Calixto Ortega Sanchez, who led Venezuela's central bank from 2018 to 2025.

items.title: AI Deepfakes, Old Images Fuel Misinformation After Maduro's Capture

items.summary: Venezuela's interim leader Delcy Rodriguez insisted Tuesday no foreign power was governing her country, even as US President Donald Trump announced Caracas will be swiftly turning over millions of barrels of oil to the United States.

items.title: Trump Says His Voters Loved Venezuela Attack. Here's A Fact Check

items.title: トランプ大統領 制裁対象のベネズエラ原油 “米に引き渡す”
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉原油受特朗普总统制裁“交付大米”
items.summary: アメリカのトランプ大統領は6日、ベネズエラが、アメリカの制裁対象となっている3000万から5000万バレルの原油をアメリカに引き渡すことになるとSNSで発表しました。原油は市場価格に基づいて販売され、その収益はトランプ大統領が管理し、ベネズエラとアメリカの国民のために活用するとしています。

items.title: 6日 島根と鳥取で震度5強の地震 同程度の規模の地震に注意を
items.title_zh: 6岛根和鸟取地震，地震烈度为5注意类似震级的地震
items.summary: 6日、島根県東部を震源とするマグニチュード6.4の地震が発生し、島根県と鳥取県で震度5強の揺れを観測しました。その後も地震活動は続いていて、気象庁は、この地域では過去に規模の大きな地震のあと同じ程度の規模の地震が続発したことがあるとして、1週間程度は注意するよう呼びかけています。

items.title: 中国 軍民両用の品目 日本向け輸出規制強化レアアースも対象か
items.title_zh: 中国军用和民用物品是否都受到日本更严格的出口管制，包括稀土？
items.summary: 中国政府は6日、軍民両用の品目の日本向けの輸出規制を強化すると発表し、ハイテク産業などに欠かせないレアアースも対象になる可能性があります。いわゆる「台湾有事」をめぐる高市総理大臣の国会答弁に対する反発の一環とみられます。

items.title: グリーンランドめぐり 米報道官 “軍も選択肢” 欧州はけん制
items.title_zh: 美国格陵兰发言人“军事是一种选择”欧洲是一场争吵
items.summary: アメリカのホワイトハウスの報道官は、トランプ大統領がデンマーク自治領のグリーンランドを取得する意欲を改めて示していることをめぐり、軍事行動も今後の選択肢に含まれるという考えを示しました。

items.title: 自民 国民の連立入りに期待　国民 前向き・慎重両論
items.title_zh: 向国家民主党前进
items.summary: 自民党内では政治の安定を目指して国民民主党の連立政権入りに期待する声が出ています。これに対し国民民主党内には前向きな意見と慎重な意見の両論があり、まずは新年度予算案の成立に向けて与党側と協議を進めた上で、対応を検討することにしています。

items.title: NBA ブルズ 河村勇輝と再びツーウエー契約締結と発表

items.summary: NBA＝アメリカプロバスケットボールのブルズはけがの影響で開幕直前に契約を解除していた河村勇輝選手と再びツーウエー契約を結んだと発表しました。

items.title: 中国 パンダめぐっても韓国と協議 幅広い分野で協力進める姿勢
items.title_zh: 我们将继续在涉及中国大熊猫的广泛问题上与韩国合作
items.summary: 韓国のイ・ジェミョン（李在明）大統領と中国の李強首相が6日、北京で会談し、関係を強化する方針で一致しました。中国はジャイアントパンダをめぐっても韓国と協議を行い、日本との関係もにらみながら、幅広い分野で韓国との協力を進める姿勢を示しています。

items.title: PPP leader issues belated apology for martial law fiasco
items.title_zh: PPP领导人为戒严失败道歉
items.summary: Rep. Jang Dong-hyeok, chairman of the main opposition People Power Party (PPP), issued a formal apology Wednesday for the 2024 martial law fiasco, a move widely seen as an effort to distance the party from former President Yoon Suk Yeol. The apology came more than a year after Yoon, who entered office as the party's candidate, abruptly imposed martial law — a decision that led to his impeachment and criminal prosecution. "The emergency martial law declared on Dec. 3, 2024, was an inappropriate and misguided measure that did not fit the situation. It led to significant confusion and inconvenience to the public, and inflicted deep wounds on our party members who have upheld the constitutional order of liberal democracy," Jang said at a press conference at the party's headquarters. "As the ruling party at the time and a key pillar of state governance, we failed to fulfill our responsibilities," he added. "We take that responsibility very seriously. I offer my deepest apologies to the public." The belated apology comes as the PPP continues to grapple with internal turmoil stemming from the

items.title: Seoul’s landmark soup kitchen faces threat as neighborhood gentrifies
items.title_zh: 随着街区的中产阶级化，首尔标志性的汤厨房面临威胁
items.summary: A yearslong legal battle over Babfor, Seoul’s most storied soup kitchen, has ignited a debate over the rising pressures of urban redevelopment and the fraying of Korea’s social safety net. Last month, a court blocked the Dongdaemun District Office’s attempt to demolish the site, handing a temporary reprieve to a Christian charity that has served as a lifeline for some of the city's most impoverished residents since 1988. The conflict comes as Korea grapples with the highest elderly poverty rate in the developed world, with nearly 40 percent of those over 65 living in relative poverty. Against a backdrop of low public social spending, Babfor — Korean for "sharing rice" — remains a critical stopgap, feeding up to 1,000 people daily. Yet as the neighborhood gentrifies, the charity’s future remains precarious, reflecting a broader tension between Seoul’s drive for modernization and its obligation to its most vulnerable citizens. The friction has intensified as Cheongnyangni, a neighborhood in northeastern Seoul, sheds its reputation from a gritty transit hub to luxury high-rise

items.summary: RIYADH — Standard Chartered Global Research (“SC Global Research”) expected Saudi Arabia to continue delivering robust GDP growth of 4.5 percent in 2026, outperforming the 3.4 percent growth rate
